Key Match Events: Naseem Shah hit sixes in the last over to secure a one-wicket win for Pakistan
Fazalhaq Farooqi's full tosses led to sixes and eliminated both Afghanistan and India
Pakistan required 11 runs from the final over with Naseem Shah and Mohammad Hasnain at the crease
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and elected to bowl first
Afghanistan's bowlers kept the scoring rate low early in the innings
Post-Match Reflections: Naseem Shah's hits led to frenzied celebrations in the Pakistan camp and a tearful exit for his opponents
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rahmanullah Gurbaz hit back-to-back sixes in the second over
Zazai was dismissed for a duck after being given a reprieve in the previous over
Pakistan's spinners Shadab and Mohammad Nawaz stifled Afghanistan's scoring rate
Ibrahim consumed 30 balls for 26 runs, playing the anchor's role poorly
Pakistan's fast bowlers kept Rashid Khan and Azmatullah Omarzai quiet in the death overs
